snippet: The family story of Kevin Youkilis, the hard-nosed 33-year-old veteran with the unusual batting stance, is filled with name changes and tales of persecution in Eastern Europe.
abstract: Family history of Kevin Youkilis, veteran third baseman who has signed with the New York Yankees, is marked by hardship and persecution in Eastern Europe; Youkilis' Jewish heritage will likely resonate in the New York market, where many fans are Jewish and have similar immigrant roots.
lead_paragraph: The family story of Kevin Youkilis, the hard-nosed 33-year-old veteran with the unusual batting stance, is filled with name changes and tales of persecution in Eastern Europe.

headline.seo: Kevin Youkilis’s Jewish Roots Provoke Fascination
headline.main: Fascination With a New Yankee’s Jewish Roots
headline.print_headline: Fascination With a New Yankee’s Jewish Roots
